content.question: Researchers are interested in studying gender development across the lifespan. Researchers recruited 500 children to participate in a study. All of the children were seven years old when the study began, and researchers plan on studying these 500 children for a period of 20 years. This study would be an example of what type of research design?

topic.text: 3.1: Themes and Methods in Developmental Psychology

skill.text: 2.A: Determine the type of research design(s) used in a given study.
